sentences.en: Figure 22 - 3 shows the approximate extent of Eurocurrency holdings today.
sentences.cn: 图22-3展示了目前欧洲货币持有额的大致数额.

sentences.en: For each approximate solution of a parameterized problem, the app also displays the margin of error.
sentences.cn: 对于每一个参数化问题的近似结果，这个程序也会显示误差的边界。

sentences.en: His description of what happened approximate d to the truth, but he still left a few details out.
sentences.cn: 他叙述所发生的事近于实情, 但尚遗漏了几项细节问题.

sentences.en: Newton mechanics is no more than an approximate version of quantum mechanics.
sentences.cn: 牛顿力学只是量子力学的一种近似描述.

sentences.en: Only approximate solutions may be obtained even in the best of circumstances.
sentences.cn: 即使在最佳的条件下,只能得到近似的解值.

sentences.en: The approximate annual rate of world population is 2 percent.
sentences.cn: 世界人口每年的增长率约为2%.

sentences.en: The approximate cost varies from around $150 to $250.
sentences.cn: 大致的费用在$150至$250之间不等。

sentences.en: The approximate date of his departure is next month.
sentences.cn: 他大约在下个月动身.

sentences.en: The approximate time of their arrival will be five o'clock.
sentences.cn: 他们约五点到达.

sentences.en: The computation of approximate solutions was an extremely laborious task.
sentences.cn: 近似解的计算是极其繁重的工作.

sentences.en: The cost will approximate two million dollars.
sentences.cn: 该项费用差不多达两百万元.

sentences.en: The mixture described below will approximate it, but is not exactly the same.
sentences.cn: 下面所描述的混合物会与之近似，但不完全一样。

sentences.en: The model downloaded to a smart phone finds an approximate solution for a new set of parameters by reference to the precomputed solutions.
sentences.cn: 这个模型会被下载到智能手机上，通过引用预先计算好的结果来找到一个对应新的参数组的近似结果。

sentences.en: These percentages are only approximate.
sentences.cn: 这些百分比仅仅是近似值。

sentences.en: They are far more amenable to approximate solutions.
sentences.cn: 对于求近似解来说,它们却好用得多.

sentences.en: They did not have even an approximate idea what the Germans really wanted.
sentences.cn: 他们完全不清楚德国人真正想要什么。

sentences.en: This figure approximates to a quarter of the UK’s annual consumption.
sentences.cn: 这个数字接近英国年消耗量的四分之一。

sentences.en: This figure is at most an approximate average value.
sentences.cn: 这数字最多是个近似平均值.

sentences.en: Until the versions released in 1995, chunks were left unsorted within bins, so that the best-fit strategy was only approximate .
sentences.cn: 直到1995年发布的半本，块在箱子里还是未排序的，所以最佳适合策略还只是近似的。

sentences.en: We are entirely justified in using the approximate theory.
sentences.cn: 我们用近似理论就完全正当.

sentences.en: We can use this result to establish bounds on approximate solutions.
sentences.cn: 我们可以利用这个结果求出近似解的界限.

sentences.en: We work with approximate numbers.
sentences.cn: 我们求近似数字.

sentences.en: What is the approximate number of students in each class?
sentences.cn: 每个班大致有多少学生？

phrases.tran_cn: 近似数，近似值；大概的数目
近似值，近似价值；概算价值

trans.tran_en: an approximate number, amount, or time is close to the exact number, amount etc, but could be a little bit more or less than it
to be close to a particular number
to be close to a particular number
to be close to a particular number
